chapterinfo.title: NATO Interoperabiltiy Standards and Profiles
chapterinfo.subtitle: A NEW "OPEN SYSTEMS" APPROACH FOR NATO
chapterinfo.corpauthor: ISSC NATO Open Systems Working Group

section.para: This version contains the NISP Volumes 1 - 5 in both html and pdf formats.

This agreed document was developed by the NATO Open Systems Working Group (NOSWG) under the authority of the NATO Consultation, Command and Control Board (NC3B). Under AC/322-N(2011)0021-REV2-AS1, the NATO Consultation, Command and Control Board noted ADatP-34(E) and approved the standards and profiles in Volume 2 as mandatory for use in NATO common funded systems in accordance with the NATO networked C3 Interoperability Policy.
